description: This 16C villa, a period residence with many intimate dining rooms, boasts a picture-postcard setting. The cuisine is typical of the Veneto region, with dishes such as home-made pasta (with or without stuffing) and home-produced charcuterie on the menu. Named after General De Winckels who once lived here, the Cantina del Generale offers a wide selection of the best vintages which include local wines and labels from further field, with a focus on Amarone wines.
